summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Optimus Echo Predictor MVP - backend APIs 100% functional, frontend core workflows working with minor display issues

ui_bugs.issue: Risk level indicators and prediction content may not be rendering correctly on predictions page
ui_bugs.selector: Risk level badges and prediction details

design_issues.issue: Robot animation component selector not found, may be using different class names

passed_tests: All 28 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Landing page loads with title and statistics
Dashboard navigation and KPI cards display
Dashboard charts rendering (Error Rates, Symbiosis Trend, Risk Distribution)
Scenario Builder page loads with presets
Scenario creation workflow using Standard Assembly preset
Prediction execution and navigation to results page
Data Upload page loads with drag-drop zone
Synthetic gesture data generation (50 samples successfully generated)
Alert system displaying active alerts on dashboard
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fixes needed: 1) Verify prediction results display formatting on predictions page, 2) Check RobotPreview component class names on landing page. All core functionality working correctly.
